## Glossary of Key Terms

- **DSI**: Data Science Institute  
- **CODAS**: Committee on Data Science   
- **PSD**: Physical Science Division
- **OIA**: Office of International Affairs 
- **CPT**: Curricular Practical Training, degree-based or course-based (F-1 Visa student)   
- **OPT**: Optional Practical Training (F-1 Visa student)   
- **my.UChicago**: University portal for registration, grades, and personal records
